post.title: new powershot sx220 hs in a whitebox reconditioned?
post.content: hi. i just received my new powershot sx220 hs , the thing is it came in a plain white box with no lettering or anything on the outside with only an intact silver security seal, when i opened the box my camera was sitting on few pieces of what looked like tissue paper. now i paid full price for this camera from a large online retailer in the uk, have a received a reconditioned camera? thanks john.
